name: Dragon Slayer (itch)
description:
Dragon Slayer™
Welcome to Dragon Slayer™.

You've always been an entrepreneur and now is your chance!

As COVID-19 ravages the world, we created a game where you have to survive some obstacles and fight a dragon!

This game was created by TheLast Shoguns™, which was formed for 1-Bit Weekend GameJam, with the theme "Dragon" 

Roba - Leader &Pixel Artist

https://roba07.itch.io

 Siem- Programmer

https://siemberhane.itch.io/

Bowandogs -  Pixel Artist

https://itch.io/profile/bowandogs

Thank you for your support. We look forward to your votes and are sure that you will enjoy this game.

Controls:
A/left arrow -  moving to the left

D/right arrow - moving to the right

SPACE -  jump

Left click - attck

Built for Microsoft Windows and WebGL.
